H0.text: Endocrine diseases are disorders exemplified by type 1 diabetes and gigantism.

H1.text: Cardiac diseases are the type of disorder that includes Type 1 diabetes and gigantism.

H2.text: Respiratory diseases are the type of disorder that includes Type 1 diabetes and gigantism.

H3.text: Inborn errors of metabolism are the type of disorder exemplified by Type 1 diabetes and gigantism.

A4.text: Type 1 Diabetes is listed as a glucose homeostasis disorder under endocrine diseases.

A5.text: Gigantism is listed as a pituitary gland disorder under endocrine diseases.
